### Data Flow

Explanation of how data flows through the system:

```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
    participant A as Component 1
    participant B as Component 2
    participant C as Component 3

    A->>B: Request
    B->>C: Forward request
    C-->>B: Response
    B-->>A: Result
```

**Figure 2:** Sequence diagram showing interaction.
